Visit Einhovant's School of Magic on Talking Island and speak with Grand Magister Gallint. He'll ask you to capture and bring him some spirits that escaped from the school.
Complete this quest successfully and you'll receive an excellent weapon known as a Wand of Adept, and also a Spiritshot for Beginners.
[Penalty for Dying]

From now on, you will be penalized whenever your character dies. You must avoid death in order to preserve your Exp.
